item.title: Big Dreams Begin Small: The Essential First Steps To AI Success
item.description: Tech companies are shooting for the stars with AI. Ambitious implementations dominate the headlines, but for many users, it’s too much too soon.

item.title: Germany’s Got A “Bug” In Its Food, And No, We Are Not Exterminating It
item.description: A groundbreaking European Union regulation allows mealworm powder in various food products. What's the impact to the global supply chain?

item.title: Drizzle, Sizzle, And Now Frizzle. Graza Debuts New High-Heat Cooking Oil And Spray Bottle Format
item.description: Graza's innovation continues as it launches a high-heat cooking oil and several new packaging formats

item.title: Navigating A Tightening Cybersecurity Jobs Market
item.description: As the job market tightens, it becomes increasingly important for aspiring cybersecurity practitioners to find substantive ways to stand out.

item.title: Why Proprietary Data Is The New Gold For AI Companies
item.description: The tussle for AI dominance may be entering a new realm where proprietary data is the holy grail for AI development.
